summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to capital facilities; approving and providing for general obligation indebtedness of the City in the form of limited tax general obligation bonds, general lease obligations, or other lawful forms of general obligation indebtedness, or any combination thereof, in one or more series, for the purposes of paying part of the costs of effecting the beneficial transfer of a parking garage in downtown Seattle and associated property interests to the City and paying part of the transaction costs related to such indebtedness and beneficial transfer, and for other lawful City purposes; providing for terms, covenants and manner of sale of the evidence of such indebtedness; authorizing the creation of a fund; and providing for agreements and activities in connection with such indebtedness and beneficial transfer or other lawful City purpose.
